record.field: Protecting Agent - Ensure Clearance On time
Port Agent - Collate Vessel & Cargo Documentation

field.name: required_document_line
field.eval:
[ (4, ref('company_memo.shipping_particulars')), (4, ref('company_memo.last_port_clearance')), (4, ref('company_memo.maritime_declaration_health')), (4, ref('company_memo.ship_storelist')), (4, ref('company_memo.nil_list')), (4, ref('company_memo.crew_list')), (4, ref('company_memo.memo_crew_effects')), (4, ref('company_memo.memo_narcotics_doc')), (4, ref('company_memo.ship_storelist')), (4, ref('company_memo.ship_storelist')), (4, ref('company_memo.stowage_plan_doc')), (4, ref('company_memo.bill_of_laden')), (4, ref('company_memo.transit_documents')), (4, ref('company_memo.notice_readiness_protecting_agency')),
]

record.field: Process rotation number with custom, Electronic manifest, Advise Vessel to custom
Declare Vessel to NPA, NIMASA, TERMINAL
Sign Satement of Fact (SOF), Export manifest, Mate receipt with Master
Sign Statement of Fact (SOF) with Captain
Immigration Rummaging and Assistance of Departure Clearance
Inform Terminal by mail destination of tanker and update ETA
Preparation for inward clearance at the terminal
Monitoring of loading for update reporting document
Monitoring of loading for update reporting
